attributes.action: Give Blackpool the casino and not Manchester
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Manchester does not need a casino in such a poor area in Manchester it would not improve the future prospects for the local community (e.g. Atlantic City).  
Blackpool people on the whole want this casino and submitted the first offer.  
I think the government is making a mistake believing gambling does not bring hardship.
Please vote if you think Blackpool would benefit rather than Manchester.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
